3.name: Narration
3.text:
When the light returned to Sol's vision shrouded
in darkness, the surrounding scenery had
completely changed. Although she was supposed to
have been on a scorching red mountain just a
moment ago, she was now in a small hut at the foot
of the mountain.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
The red dragon, which had been about to devour
her, was nowhere to be seen. Instead, a black-
haired female adventurer was tending to the
injured.

8.name: Erick
8.text:
"At that time, it was Eni-sensei who saved us from
the red dragon. She used the power of the
<Transference Helm> to teleport us here.
Seriously? That helm alone is worth about 20,000
gold coins! And she just casually used it!"

9.name: Eni-sensei
9.text:
"I may have overused that precious Transference
Helm and ended up breaking it. But well, it served
its purpose quite well."

11.name: Eni-sensei
11.text:
"Long time no see. You've grown quite splendidly,
Sol."

17.name: Eni-sensei
17.text:
"That red dragon... known as Evennajetoldor... He
is the one who slew Sol's mother and plundered her
nest. He is an Ancient Dragon."

19.name: Erick
19.text:
"This is no joke... Without Eni-sensei, we would
have definitely been wiped out. The fact that such
a monster was this close by, is unbelievable."

20.name: Eni-sensei
20.text:
"Most likely, after attacking Sol's parent's nest,
he made it his base and expanded his influence to
this extent. It's only a matter of time before
this village is attacked."

21.name: Sol
21.text:
"Te-teacher!!! I... I want to defeat him... I want
to defeat him!!"

22.name: Eni-sensei
22.text:
"With Sol's current abilities, it's probably
impossible. He is such a formidable opponent.
There aren't many who can defeat him."

24.name: Eni-sensei
24.text: "However, it's not like there's no way."

26.name: Eni-sensei
26.text:
"Let's search for the magical weapon created to
slay dragons... the Dragon Slayer."

27.name: Eni-sensei
27.text:
"It is said that this weapon easily cuts through
dragon scales and greatly diminishes their
power... If we are to defeat the Ancient Dragon,
then it will be necessary."

28.name: Erick
28.text:
"The Dragon Slayer, huh... I've heard about it in
hero tales, but do we know where it is?"

30.name: Ma-kun
30.text:
"Then we have no choice but to search for someone
who might know... They might be somewhere
nearby..."

36.name: Isk
36.text: "The Dragon Slayer... I do have some idea of it."

41.name: Isk
41.text:
"During the previous war, the hero Yamano defeated
the evil dragon... At that time, he wielded the
Dragon Slayer's magic sword. It is a legendary
sword that he obtained after overcoming eight
trials and was bestowed upon him by the war god
Auld, a sword that has been forged since ancient
times..."

42.name: Sol
42.text:
"Wow...!!! Amazing!! ...So, where is that sword
now?"

43.name: Isk
43.text:
"After the war, he headed to the labyrinth of
trials and disappeared... If he ended his life in
the labyrinth of trials... then it is likely that
the Dragon Slayer is also sleeping in that
labyrinth..."

44.name: Sol
44.text:
"Ooooooh...!! I see...!! ...Could it be that the
legendary Dragon Slayer is in a dangerous place?"

45.name: Isk
45.text:
"Of course... it is a dangerous place... Many
adventurers have challenged it, giving birth to
many heroes, and yet it is a terrifying labyrinth
that swallows up more lives than that... If Sol-
sama is going to challenge it as well... please be
careful..."

46.name: Sol
46.text:
"Ooooooh...! But I can't just stop here! In order
to avenge my mother, I will definitely obtain the
Dragon Slayer no matter what!"
